name: Banner Ablaze
description:
Developed in 4 weeks by a team of five people, Banner Ablaze is a tactical turn-based rpg in the wave of Fire Emblem, Wargroove and Armello.
In a japan devastated by territorie wars, fight for the honnor of your clan and the freedom of your country.

It's time to engage the fight.
